bug.author: dagophil
bug.summary: Which license must be provided with my application when using the tensorflow C API?
bug.description: I am developing a commercial application that uses the tensorflow C API. At all kinds of places, for example, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/LICENSE>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/LICENSE</denchmark-link> , I found that tensorflow uses the Apache License 2.0. However, when I downloaded the C API from <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/install/lang_c>https://www.tensorflow.org/install/lang_c</denchmark-link> (<denchmark-link:https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/libtensorflow/libtensorflow-cpu-windows-x86_64-1.13.1.zip>https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/libtensorflow/libtensorflow-cpu-windows-x86_64-1.13.1.zip</denchmark-link> ) it came with a huge LICENSE file that lists many 3rd party libraries. Which license do I need to distribute with my application? Do I need to add the Apache License 2.0 for tensorflow or do I need to add the content of the LICENSE file that came with the C API?

comments.comment: Has there been any progress on this issue? I still do not know which license I need to distribute with an application that uses the tensorflow C API.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dagophil>@dagophil</denchmark-link> , Our license is in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/LICENSE>LICENSE</denchmark-link> . Beyond that, we can't provide any legal advice. You may want to consult your own counsel if you have questions. Good luck.

Are you satisfied with the resolution of your issue? <denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=Yes&entry.2137816233=29953>Yes</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=No&entry.2137816233=29953>No</denchmark-link>
